Introduction
This topic contains information on the extent of a representative’s authority, including
general scope of a representative's authority
representative’s authority to submit claims and other claim-related documents
authorization of associate attorneys and attorney support staff
duties that authorized law students, legal interns, and paralegals can perform
information technology (IT) access and other disclosures
representative’s access to Federal tax information (FTI)
, and
questions or disputes about representatives
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A - General Information on Power of Attorney (POA)
citation: Part I, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section A
